metadata.title: CVE-2024-26649 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amdgpu: Fix the null pointer when load rlc firmwareIf the RLC firmware is invalid because of wrong header size,the pointer to the rlc firmware is released in functionamdgpu_ucode_request. There will be a null pointer errorin subsequent use. So skip validation to fix it.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
